00017 typedef struct _datetime 
00018 {
00019     unsigned long   year;
00020     unsigned long   month;
00021     unsigned long   day;
00022     unsigned long   hour;
00023     unsigned long   minute;
00024     unsigned long   second;
00025     unsigned long   millisecond;  //rfu
00026 } t_datetime;
